short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create professional Estimates in Minutes. Easily send your Quotes  by Email, Text, WhatsApp, or download in PDF.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Estimate Maker is a powerful tool that allows you to quickly build estimates on the fly and  easily share them to your customers or download in PDF.
Features:
- Custom Branding - Use your company logo.
- Print, Export or Email in PDF format.
- Customizable templates with unlimited theme colors.
- Add Tax and Discounts to your quotes.
- Includes custom fields for  adding custom text to your quotes.
- Multi-Currency Support and more
